context.description: Any other arbitrary data captured by the agent, optionally provided by the user

db.description: An object containing contextual data for database spans

statement.description: A database statement (e.g. query) for the given database type

type.description: Database type. For any SQL database, "sql". For others, the lower-case database category, e.g. "cassandra", "hbase", or "redis"

http.description: An object containing contextual data of the related http request.

url.description: The raw url of the correlating http request.

status_code.description: The status code of the http request.

method.description: The method of the http request.

duration.description: Duration of the span in milliseconds

name.description: Generic designation of a span in the scope of a transaction

stacktrace.description: List of stack frames with variable attributes (eg: lineno, filename, etc)

type.description: Keyword of specific relevance in the service's domain (eg: 'db.postgresql.query', 'template.erb', etc)

sync.description: Indicates whether the span was executed synchronously or asynchronously.
